00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Profile
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Profile()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Profile(XmlElement Element)
00048         {
00049             if (Element.Name.Equals("profile", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00050             {
00051                 if (Element.Attributes["name"] != null)
00052                 {
00053                     Name = Element.Attributes["name"].Value;
00054                 }
00055                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00056                 {
00057                     try
00058                     {
00059                         if (Child.Name.Equals("implicitdata", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00060                         {
00061                             ImplicitData=new Data((XmlElement)Child);
00062                         }
00063                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("explicitdata", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00064                         {
00065                             ExplicitData=new Data((XmlElement)Child);
00066                         }
00067                     }
00068                     catch { }
00069                 }
00070             }
00071         }
00072         #endregion
00073 
00074         #region Properties
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078         public string Name
00079         {
00080             get { return _Name; }
00081             set { _Name = value; }
00082         }
00083         private string _Name = "";
00084 
00088         public Data ImplicitData
00089         {
00090             get { return _ImplicitData; }
00091             set { _ImplicitData = value; }
00092         }
00093         private Data _ImplicitData = new Data();
00094 
00098         public Data ExplicitData
00099         {
00100             get { return _ExplicitData; }
00101             set { _ExplicitData = value; }
00102         }
00103         private Data _ExplicitData = new Data();
00104         #endregion
00105 
00106         #region Overridden Functions
00107         public override string ToString()
00108         {
00109             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00110             Builder.Append("<Profile name=\"" + Name + "\">");
00111             Builder.Append("<ImplicitData>"+ImplicitData.ToString()+"</ImplicitData>");
00112             Builder.Append("<ExplicitData>"+ExplicitData.ToString()+"</ExplicitData>");
00113             Builder.Append("</Profile>");
00114             return Builder.ToString();
00115         }
00116         #endregion
00117     }
00118 }
